title: Are many people having this terrible lag while updating?
body: What is this DSL speed I am getting?

replies.body: Your speed is solid, but it doesn't make you immune from hitting blocks along the way to the patching server.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings just in case, and run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your connection is holding steady while grabbing these updates.

Thanks for the reply!  Unfortunately I cannot use your hextech repair tool as it does not scale properly at 4k resolution, thus I cannot click anything.  If you could fix the scaling issues that would be great
